input.sentences: this street has a large mural on the side of it .
the mural was painted by local members of the community .
the murals have messages of love and respect .
the mural is a beautiful addition to the town .
all the townspeople like the mural .
output.sentences: The man went for a ride on his bike.
He saw a wall full of graffiti.
He particularly liked the graffiti that said Amelia.
He liked the one with a hear, too.
He wished someone would wish him happy birthday on the wall!
